articles.title: Oil prices fall as Russia, Saudi Arabia expected to boost supply - Deccan Herald
articles.description: Oil prices fall as Russia, Saudi Arabia expected to boost supply
articles.content: Turkey, Brazil, Morocco, Tunisia and Saudi Arabia were among the main destinations for Russian diesel this year, JPMorgan said in a note.
